entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Sandy Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:56 AM CST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, -29.4°C

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 24.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind west 20 km/h. High minus 24. Wind chill minus 43 this morning and minus 36 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 31.
